features.name: Relentless (3)
features.effect: The Burrower can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn

features.name: Earth Eruption
features.effect: Mark a Stress to have the Burrower burst out of the ground

features.name: Spit Acid
features.effect: Make an attack against all targets in front of the Burrower within Close range

features.name: Acid Bath
features.effect: When the Burrower takes Severe damage, all creatures within Close range take 1d10 direct physical damage. The area within Very Close range of the Burrower becomes a hazardous acid bath: all creatures other than the Burrower who move through it take 1d6 direct physical damage.

details.hazard_effect: all creatures other than the Burrower who move through it take 1d6 direct physical damage

features.name: Overwhelming Force
features.effect: Targets who mark HP from the Bear's standard attack are knocked back to Very Close range

features.name: Bite
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, the target takes 3d4+10 physical damage and is Restrained until they break free with a successful Strength Roll.

on_success.duration_text: until they break free with a successful Strength Roll

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Bear makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear

features.name: Ramp Up
features.effect: You must spend a Fear to spotlight the Ogre. While spotlighted, they can make their standard attack against all targets within Very Close range.

features.name: Bone Breaker
features.effect: The Ogre's attacks deal direct damage.

features.name: Hail of Boulders
features.effect: Mark a Stress to pick up heavy objects and throw them at all targets in front of the Ogre within Far range. Make an attack roll. On a success, targets take 1d10+2 physical damage. If you hit two or more targets, gain a Fear.

features.name: Rampaging Fury
features.effect: When the Ogre marks 2 or more HP, they can rampage. They move up to Close range, and all targets in their path take 2d6+3 direct physical damage.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Construct can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn

features.name: Weak Structure
features.effect: When the Construct marks HP from physical damage, they must mark an additional HP.

features.name: Trample
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets in the Construct's path as they move up to Close range. On a success, they take 1d8 physical damage.

features.name: Overload
features.effect: Before rolling damage for the Construct's attack, you can mark a Stress to add 10 damage to the roll and take the spotlight.

features.name: Death Quake
features.effect: When the Construct marks their last HP, the magic powering them ruptures in an explosion. Make an attack roll with advantage against all targets within Very Close range. On a success, targets take 1d12+2 magic damage.

features.name: Mockery
features.effect: Mark a Stress to say something mocking and force a target within Close range to make a Presence Reaction Roll (14). On a failure, they mark 2 Stress and are Vulnerable until the scene ends.

features.name: Scapegoat
features.effect: Spend a Fear and target a PC. The Courtier convinces a crowd or prominent individual that the target is the catalyst for some problem in their lives.

details.description: Convinces a crowd or prominent individual that the target is the catalyst for some problem in their lives.

features.name: Horde (1d4+1)
features.effect: When the Mosquitoes have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+1 physical damage.

features.name: Flying
features.effect: While flying, the Mosquitoes have a +2 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Bloodsucker
features.effect: When the Mosquitoes' attack causes a target to mark HP, you can mark a Stress to deal an additional 1 direct HP damage.

features.name: Ground Slam
features.effect: Slam the ground, knocking all targets within Very Close range back to Far range and causing them to mark a Stress.

features.name: Grab and Drag
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Close range. On a success, spend a Fear to pull them into Melee range, deal 1d6+2 physical damage, and make them Restrained until the Defender takes Severe damage.

on_success.duration_text: until the Defender takes Severe damage

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.effect: If the Wolf makes a successful standard attack and another Dire Wolf is within Melee range of the target, the attack deals 1d6+5 physical damage instead and you gain a Fear.

details.condition: Another Dire Wolf is within Melee range of the target
Another Dire Wolf is within Melee range of the target

features.name: Hobbling Strike
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, the target takes 3d4+10 direct physical damage and is Vulnerable until they clear at least 1 HP.

on_success.duration_text: until they clear at least 1 HP

features.name: Minion (3)
features.effect: The Rat is defeated when they take any damage. For every 3 damage a PC deals to a group of Rats, they defeat an additional Rat.

features.name: Group Attack
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Giant Rats within Close range of that target. Make a single attack roll for all spotlighted Rats. On a success, the target takes 1 direct physical damage per spotlighted Rat.

features.name: Double Strike
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make a standard attack against two targets within Melee range.

features.name: Venomous Stinger
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, spend a Fear to deal 1d4+4 physical damage and make them Poisoned until their next rest or they succeed on a Knowledge Roll (16). While Poisoned, the target must roll a d6 before they make an action roll. On a 1, they fail the roll.

on_success.duration_text: until their next rest or they succeed on a Knowledge Roll (16)
on_success.details: While Poisoned, the target must roll a d6 before they make an action roll. On a 1, they fail the roll.

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Scorpion makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Armor-Shredding Shards
features.effect: On a successful attack within Melee range against the Snake, the attacker must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits. If they can't, they take 1 direct HP damage.

features.name: Spinning Serpent
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets take 1d6+1 physical damage on a success.

features.name: Spitter
features.effect: Spend a Fear to introduce a d6 Spitter Die. When the Snake is in the spotlight, roll the die. On a 5 or higher, all targets in front of the Snake within Far range must succeed on an Agility Roll or take 1d4 physical damage, and the Snake loses the spotlight.

features.name: Maintain Distance
features.effect: After making a standard attack, the Harrier can move anywhere within Far range.

features.name: Fall Back
features.effect: When a creature moves into Melee range to make an attack, you can mark a Stress to move the Harrier to Close range and make an attack against that creature. On a success, they take 1d10+2 physical damage.

features.name: Shield Wall
features.effect: A creature who tries to move within Very Close range of the Guard must succeed on an Agility Roll (Difficulty 12 + the number of other Guards in a line with the Guard) or stop at Melee range.

details.difficulty_text: special (increases with # of guards in line)

features.name: Detain
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, mark a Stress to make them Restrained until they break free with a successful attack, Finesse Roll, or Strength Roll.

on_success.duration_text: until they break free with a successful attack, Finesse Roll, or Strength Roll

features.name: Rally Guards
features.effect: Spend 2 Fear to spotlight the Head Guard and up to 2d4 allies within Far range.

features.name: On My Signal
features.effect: Countdown (5). When the Head Guard is in the spotlight for the first time, activate. Ticks down when a PC makes an attack roll. When the countdown ends, all Archer Guards within Far range make an attack against the nearest target with advantage. Combine damage on the same target.

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Head Guard makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Hobbling Shot
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 1d12+3 physical damage. If the target marks HP, they have disadvantage on Agility Rolls until they clear at least 1 HP.

on_success.duration_text: until they clear at least 1 HP

features.name: Climber
features.effect: The Bandit climbs just as easily as they run.

features.name: From Above
features.effect: When the Bandit succeeds on a standard attack from above a target, they deal 1d10+1 physical damage instead.

features.name: Curse
features.effect: Choose a target within Far range and temporarily Curse them. While the target is Cursed, you can mark a Stress when that target rolls with advantage to force them to reroll their dice.

details.special_effect: While Cursed, you can mark a Stress when that target rolls with advantage to force them to reroll their dice.

features.name: Chaotic Flux
features.effect: Make an attack against up to three targets within Very Close range. Mark a Stress to deal 2d6+3 magic damage on a success.

features.name: I've Got 'Em
features.effect: Creatures Restrained by the Kneebreaker take double damage from attacks by other adversaries.

details.description: take double damage from attacks by other adversaries

features.name: Hold Them Down
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, the target takes no damage but is Restrained and Vulnerable until they break free with a successful Strength Roll or is freed by an ally.

on_success.duration_text: until they break free with a successful Strength Roll or is freed by an ally
until they break free with a successful Strength Roll or is freed by an ally

features.name: Tactician
features.effect: When you spotlight the Lieutenant, mark a Stress to also spotlight two allies within Close range.

features.name: More Where That Came From
features.effect: Summon three Jagged Knife Lackeys, who appear at Far range.

features.name: Coup de Grace
features.effect: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Close range. On a success, the target takes 2d6+12 physical damage and marks a Stress.

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Lieutenant makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Backstab
features.effect: When the Shadow succeeds on a standard attack that has advantage, they deal 1d6+6 physical damage instead.

features.name: Cloaked
features.effect: Become Hidden until after the Shadow's next attack. Attacks made while Hidden from this feature have advantage.

details.duration_text: until after the Shadow's next attack
details.special_effect: Attacks made while Hidden from this feature have advantage.

features.name: Minion (3)
features.effect: The Lackey is defeated when they take any damage. For every 3 damage a PC deals to a group of Lackeys, they defeat an additional Lackey.

features.name: Group Attack
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Jagged Knife Lackeys within Close range of that target. Make a single attack roll for all spotlighted Lackeys. On a success, the target takes 2 direct physical damage per spotlighted Lackey.

features.name: Unseen Strike
features.effect: If the Sniper is Hidden when they make a successful standard attack against a target, they deal 1d10+4 physical damage instead.

features.name: Preferential Treatment
features.effect: A PC who succeeds on a Presence Roll against the Merchant gains a discount on purchases. A PC who fails must pay more and has disadvantage on future Presence Rolls against the Merchant.

details.on_fail: must pay more and has disadvantage on future Presence Rolls against the Merchant

features.name: The Runaround
features.effect: When a PC rolls a 14 or lower on a Presence Roll made against the Merchant, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: Arcane Form
features.effect: The Elemental is resistant to magic damage.

features.name: Sickening Flux
features.effect: Mark a HP to force all targets within Close range to mark a Stress and become Vulnerable until their next rest or they clear a HP.

details.duration_text: until their next rest or they clear a HP

features.name: Remake Reality
features.effect: Spend a Fear to transform the area within Very Close range into a different biome. All targets in that area take 2d6+3 direct magic damage.

details.description: transform the area into a different biome

features.name: Magical Reflection
features.effect: When the Elemental takes damage from an attack within Close range, deal half the damage dealt back to the attacker.

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Elemental makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Elemental can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn.

features.name: Scorched Earth
features.effect: Mark a Stress to choose a point within Far range. All targets within Very Close range of that point must succeed on an Agility Roll or take 2d8 magic damage, or half on a success.

features.name: Explosion
features.effect: Spend a Fear to erupt in a fiery explosion. Make an attack against all targets within Close range. On a success, targets take 1d8 magic damage and are knocked back to Far range.

features.name: Consume Kindling
features.effect: Three times per scene, when the Elemental moves onto objects that are flammable, clear a HP or a Stress.

details.heal_string: clear a HP or a Stress

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Elemental makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Demon can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn.

features.name: All Must Fall
features.effect: When a PC rolls a failure with Fear while within Close range of the Demon, they lose a Hope.

features.name: Hellfire
features.effect: Spend a Fear to rain down hellfire within Far range. All targets in that area must succeed on an Agility Roll or take 1d20+3 magic damage, or half on a success.

features.name: Reaper
features.effect: Before rolling damage for the Demon's attack, you can mark a Stress to add damage equal to the Demon's current number of marked HP.

details.bonus_string: equal to the Demon's current number of marked HP

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Demon makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Minion (5)
features.effect: The Treant is defeated when they take any damage. For every 5 damage a PC deals to a group of Treants, they defeat an additional Treant.

features.name: Group Attack
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Minor Treants within Close range of that target. Make a single attack roll for all spotlighted Treants. On a success, the target takes 4 direct physical damage per spotlighted Treant.

features.name: Slow
features.effect: When you spotlight the Ooze and they don't have a token on their stat block, they can't make a standard attack. Add a token to their stat block. When you spotlight them and they have a token, they can make a standard attack. Remove the token.

features.name: Acidic Form
features.effect: When the Ooze makes a successful attack, the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits. If they can't, they take 1 direct HP damage.

features.name: Envelop
features.effect: Make a standard attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, the Ooze Envelops them. If the Ooze takes Severe damage, the target is freed. When a target becomes Enveloped, they must mark 2 Stress. The target must mark an additional Stress each time they're spotlighted while Enveloped.

on_success.duration_text: If the Ooze takes Severe damage, the target is freed
on_success.special_effect: target must mark 2 Stress. The target must mark an additional Stress each time they're spotlighted while Enveloped.

features.name: Split
features.effect: When the Ooze has 3 or more HP marked, you can spend a Fear to split them into two Tiny Green Oozes with no marked HP or Stress and spotlight them.

details.summon_details: with no marked HP or Stress

features.name: Acidic Form
features.effect: When the Ooze makes a successful attack, the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits. If they can't, they take 1 direct HP damage.

features.name: Creeping Fire
features.effect: The Ooze can only move within Very Close range as their normal movement. They light any flammable object they touch on fire.

details.description: Can only move within Very Close range
They light any flammable object they touch on fire.

features.name: Ignite
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, the target takes 1d8 magic damage and is Ignited until they're extinguished with a successful Finesse Roll (14). While Ignited, the target takes 1d4 magic damage when they make an action roll.

on_success.duration_text: until they're extinguished with a successful Finesse Roll (14)
on_success.details: While Ignited, the target takes 1d4 magic damage when they make an action roll.

features.name: Split
features.effect: When the Ooze has 3 or more HP marked, you can spend a Fear to split them into two Tiny Red Oozes with no marked HP or Stress and spotlight them.

details.summon_details: with no marked HP or Stress

features.name: Burning
features.effect: When a creature within Melee range deals damage to the Ooze, they take 1d6 direct magic damage.

features.name: My Land, My Rules
features.effect: All social actions made against the Noble on their land have disadvantage.

features.name: Guards, Seize Them!
features.effect: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon 1d4 Bladed Guards, who appear at Far range.

features.name: Exile
features.effect: Spend a Fear and target a PC. The Noble proclaims that the target and their allies are exiled. While exiled, the target and their allies have disadvantage during social situations within the Noble's domain.

details.condition: While exiled... during social situations within the Noble's domain

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.effect: When the Captain marks 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker marks a Stress.

features.name: Reinforcements
features.effect: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon a Pirate Raiders Horde, which appears at Far range.

features.name: No Quarter
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target who has three or more Pirates within Melee range. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll. On a failure, they mark 1d4+1 Stress. On a success, they mark 1 Stress.

details.condition: target has three or more Pirates within Melee range

features.name: Momentum
features.effect: When the Captain makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Horde (1d4+1)
features.effect: When the Raiders have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+1 physical damage.

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.effect: When the Raiders mark 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker marks a Stress.

features.name: Swashbuckler
features.effect: When the Tough marks 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker marks a Stress.

features.name: Clear the Decks
features.effect: Make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, mark a Stress to move into Melee range, deal 3d4 physical damage, and knock them back to Close range.

features.name: Minion (4)
features.effect: The Sellsword is defeated when they take any damage. For every 4 damage a PC deals to a group of Sellswords, they defeat an additional Sellsword.

features.name: Group Attack
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Sellswords within Close range of that target. Make a single attack roll for all spotlighted Sellswords. On a success, the target takes 3 direct physical damage per spotlighted Sellsword.

features.name: Opportunist
features.effect: When two or more adversaries are within Very Close range of a creature, all damage that creature takes is doubled.

details.condition: two or more adversaries are within Very Close range of a creature

features.name: Deadly Shot
features.effect: Make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 3d4+8 physical damage.

features.name: Minion (4)
features.effect: The Dredge is defeated when they take any damage. For every 4 damage a PC deals to a group of Dredges, they defeat an additional Dredge.

features.name: Group Attack
features.effect: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Dredges within Close range of that target. Make a single attack roll for all spotlighted Dredges. On a success, the target takes 1 direct physical damage per spotlighted Dredge.

features.name: Terrifying
features.effect: When the Knight makes a successful attack, all PCs within Close range lose a Hope and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Cut to the Bone
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets take 1d8+2 physical damage on a success and mark a Stress.

features.name: Dig Two Graves
features.effect: When the Knight is defeated, they make an attack against a target within Very Close range, prioritizing the creature who killed them. On a success, the target takes 1d4+8 physical damage and loses 1d4 Hope.

features.name: Only Bones
features.effect: The Warrior is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Won't Stay Dead
features.effect: When the Warrior is defeated, you can spotlight them and roll a d6. On a result of 6, if there are other Skeletons on the battlefield, the Warrior returns with 1 HP.

details.description: spotlight them and roll a d6. On a result of 6, if there are other Skeletons on the battlefield, the Warrior returns with 1 HP.
